synopsis.text: Locked away in the highest security wing of the world's most impenetrable prison, Nanba, are four inmates who share a common goal: to escape. Jyugo, a seasoned lock-picker with a knack for breaking out; Uno, a gambling aficionado with a soft spot for women; Rock, a food-loving brawler; and Nico, an otaku with an unusual reaction to drugs, are a motley crew that keeps the prison staff on their toes. Overseeing this unruly group is Hajime, a dedicated but grouchy guard determined to maintain order and the prison's reputation. Despite their confinement, these four inmates find ways to make their prison life anything but dull, as they cook up schemes, engage in shenanigans, and challenge Hajime's resolve to keep them in check. Follow the thrilling and comedic adventures of this unlikely quartet as they navigate life behind bars in Nanba.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
